title: How it feels to reach platinum
body:
[](http://imagesmtv-a.akamaihd.net/uri/mgid:file:http:shared:mtv.com/news/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/andy-monkey-1421189728.gif)
Just kidding. I can't even reach gold.
 https://media.giphy.com/media/9wHtWs7MJct1u/giphy.gif

replies.body: Keep playing until I lose, then fk it, go become an aram main for a bit
Just do what i do in this situation. play more. and win some. stop playing for a bit every now and then. and then play more.
